7.6 The DATE module

encode-year/month-duration

Function

Summary

Creates a year/month duration from a set of integer values.

Signature

encode-year/month-duration years months => duration

Arguments

years
An instance of <integer>.

months
An instance of <integer>.

Values

duration
An instance of <year/month-duration>.

Library

system

Module

date

Description

Creates an instance of <year/month-duration>.

See also

decode-duration, page 146

encode-day/time-duration, page 149

System and I/O Reference - 31 MAR 2000
